title: FIS Alpine World Ski Championships 2015 – Men's giant slalom
text:
The Men's giant slalom competition at the <a href="FIS%20Alpine%20World%20Ski%20Championships%202015">2015 World Championships</a> was held on February 13.
<a href="Ted%20Ligety">Ted Ligety</a> won his third consecutive world title.
A qualification was held a day earlier.
Results.
The first run was started at 10:15 and the second run at 14:15.
